name: state-worker
description: Share a state between processes, change it an query it

scripts.test-web: npm run build-dev && webpack --config ./webpack.web-tests.config.js && node ./test/copy-files-web-test.js && npx http-server ./test/web-test
scripts.build: npm run build:web-child && npm run copy-files && npm run build:main && npm run replace-script && npm run build:node-child
scripts.build-dev: npm run build:web-child-dev && npm run copy-files && npm run build:main-dev && npm run replace-script && npm run build:node-child-dev
